alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 15 at 5:16AM MDT until further notice by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central South Dakota, including the following counties, Mellette and Todd. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 613 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated rain was diminishing across the area. Heavy rain overnight produced between 2 and 3 inches of rain, with local amounts around 4 inches. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.1 to 0.25 inches are expected over the area this morning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... White River, Swift Bear, Horse Creek, Soldier Creek, and the northern Rosebud Reservation.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
